mapper.select: SELECT ar.role_name, ar.role_code, ap.auth_menu, ap.auth_opt, ap.auth_data FROM auth_role ar LEFT JOIN auth_role_permission arp ON ar.id = arp.role_id LEFT JOIN auth_permission ap ON arp.permission_id = ap.id WHERE ar.role_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.roleName}, '%') AND ar.role_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.roleCode}, '%') AND ar.del_flag = 1 AND arp.del_flag = 1 AND ap.del_flag = 1
